chunk_id: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0__chunk_641
source: Integrated Maternal and Perinatal Care Guideline_23_10_2024_0
text:
This counselling should be done without any tone of reprimand or disapproval.
o Understand that the request for CD may be linked to real fears of labour and birth
• In general, the performance of a CD without a valid indication is unacceptable practice.
Fetal maturity testing before elective caesarean delivery with uncertain gestational age 
• If elective (non-urgent) caesarean delivery is planned for a woman at term, and the gestational age is uncertain
but
 apparently close to term, fetal lung
